rules_text:
This spell can't be countered.
For each spell you've cast this turn, search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.
flavor_text:
[i]“Flynn threw back her head and laughed as dark wings filled the sky. She'd done it. She'd brought them from a full plane away.”
—Azamir, “Tale Of The Dragoneer”[/i]
